price: 49. Yebisa bawumbu ba ngai, ya soló, ngai nazali molimbisi natonda ngolu.
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
